title: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman meets CEOs of large global firms to woo investments - The Financial Express
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman meets CEOs of large global firms to woo investments  The Financial Express
description: Deloitte chief executive Punit Renjen said his company intends to expand its India operations to smaller cities like Coimbatore and Bhubaneswar. Deloitte, he said, has developed tools to improve the access of rural poor to health facilities.
